name: Abo Hadeed
summary:
The first full-fledged 3D PC and network game ever to be inspired by the Egyptian environment, based on the famous Egyptian movie Booha.

The game is a third person shooter action game, where the protagonist Abo Hadeed aka Boo7a struggles against various criminal groups in various Egyptian scenes. Through those adventures, Abo Hadeed fights different enemies, solves difficult puzzles and discovers a lot of staggering revelations.
